entry.content:
Master & Dynamic is thrilled to introduce the new MG20 Wireless Gaming Headphones. Breaking ground in the gaming category as the first true luxury gaming headphones.

the MG20 is crafted from magnesium, lambskin leather, and Alcantara® and features a detachable boom microphone with an additional on-board mic array for clear communication in-game and on calls. 50mm Beryllium drivers and 7.1 surround sound provide brilliant acoustics so you can truly lose yourself in the game.

We knew the time was right to create a luxury gaming headset, and our goal with the MG20 was to deliver the exceptional sound and design that Master & Dynamic is known for. The MG20 will satisfy both the professional and recreational gamer looking for technical performance, sophisticated style and high quality materials.

Jonathan Levine, Founder and CEO of Master & Dynamic

The MG20 Wireless Gaming Headphones offer a host of new features designed to optimize performance. Enjoy immersive sound thanks to 50mm Beryllium drivers and 7.1 surround sound. The MG20 also includes Qualcomm® aptX™ HD for music, and aptX™ Low-Latency for mobile gaming, and for the first time ever, an in-app equalizer in the M&D Connect app will allow users to choose between sound profiles. The MG20’s angled ear cups align to the ear’s natural shape and semi-open back acoustics create a wider, more lifelike soundstage. An elegant, detachable boom microphone provides the ultimate in-game talk clarity while an additional on-board microphone array allows for clear communication even when not gaming.

A bold expression of minimalist design, the MG20 has anodized aluminum and lightweight magnesium ear cups that create an unmatched strength-to-weight ratio for comfort and durability. The gaming headphone's sleek shape provides a sophisticated look whether gaming, working, or on-the-go. The MG20 Wireless Gaming Headphones also feature a cushioned, breathable Alcantara® headband with memory foam ear pads wrapped in lambskin for unrivaled comfort during extended gameplay, 22 hours of battery life on a single charge, and on-head detection to save battery while not in use. A low-latency USB-A adapter allows for seamless compatibility with Playstation and PC’s alike, allowing gamers to effortlessly switch between devices without having to re-pair, while Bluetooth 5.0 creates a secure connection for a 100ft/30m distance.
